timeline.bodyText: We can remove this line as Prefab.Role.None is added by default.
timeline.author: moizarafat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,7 +23,7 @@
     public static final ImmutableMap<String, Class<? extends Check>> MAPPINGS =
             ImmutableMap.<String, Class<? extends Check>>builder()
                     .put("allow all", Role.ALL.class)
-                    .put("deny all", Role.NONE.class)
+                    .put("Prefab.Role.None", Role.NONE.class)

timeline.author: aklish

replies.bodyText: thats because FilterExpressionCheck is just filtering to return only the results which match that criteria. And if nothing is found it returns Not_found.
replies.author: moizarafat
